summary: The now famous Burt Gummer returns to his hometown of Perfection, Nevada for the first time in years, but the deadliest Graboid evolution yet forces him to save the town he swore to protect.
cast: Michael Gross|Shawn Christian|Susan Chuang|Charlotte Stewart|Ariana Richards|Tony Genaro|Barry Livingston|John Pappas|Robert Jayne|Billy Rieck|Kelly Connell|Matthew Seth Wilson|Jason Hopkins|Lorna Scott|Mary Gross|Elena Sahagun|Javi Mulero|Diego Galante|Tom Everett|Jack Serino
title: Temblores 3: Regreso a perfection
